message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer you a competitive price of $15,000 for it.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $10,000 is a good price for you, but I'm still looking to get a better return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $12,500. This is the best I can do at this point.
I understand that you're looking to get a good return on your investment, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to offer $11,000 for the product. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer you the product for $12,750. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're firm on your price, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target as possible. I'm willing to offer $11,500 for the product. Can you reconsider?

I understand that you're trying to get close to your target, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $13,000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you the product for $12,900. This is my last offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to offer $11,000 for the product. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're firm on your price, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for less than $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time and offer you the product for $12,100. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're not willing to budge on the price, but I'm still trying to get as close as possible. I'm willing to offer $11,500 for the product. This is my final offer.
